name: Comrade Web Agency
tagline: We generate leads, calls and conversions!
description:
Comrade Web Agency is a full-service award-winning digital marketing, SEO and web development agency, based in Chicago. 
We love solving design, technology and marketing challenges to elevate our clients to their next levels!
We achieve it by: 
1. Team
2. Proven process
3. Industry-leading knowledge (Legal, IT, eCommerce, Corporate, Professional Services, Construction and Manufacturing)
We believe:
Any company (regardless of it’s size) with a good product can compete and win battles with “big-box corporate stores"
Our services:
Digital Marketing
Local SEO, nationwide SEO
PPC, SEM
Social Media Marketing
Email Marketing
Mobile Marketing
Inbound Marketing
Marketing Automation
Content Marketing
Web Design and Development
Why businesses choose Comrade Web Agency:
Young, creative and ambitious team of experts
For a price of one employee, CWA provides a full team consist of an experienced strategist, web designers and developers, content, SEO, PPC and social media experts
First page SEO results in 2-5 months
Dozens of case studies and happy clients
Maybe be the most experienced Local SEO team in Chicago
Result-driven marketing campaigns
HubSpot and Google Cerified partner
Full-service agency. 20+ full-time employees
Custom designs
Very competitive rates, agency quality
Industry-specific expertise
